def minimum_mp_to_kill_monsters(n, healths):

    def process(h):
        f = [0] / n
        ptr = [-1] * n
        for i in range(n):
            ptr[i] = i - 1
            while ptr[i] >= 0 and h[i] - h[ptr[i]] <= i - ptr[i]:
                ptr[i] = ptr[ptr[i]]
            count = min(i - ptr[i], h[i])
            f[i] = (h[i] - count + 1 + h[i]) * count // 2 + (f[ptr[i]] if i >= 0 else 0)
        return f
    l = process(healths)
    r = process(healths[::-1])[::-1]
    s = sum(healths)
    best = s
    for i in range(n):
        best = min(best, s - (l[i] + r[i] - healths[i]) + healths[i])
    return best
